original_title: なっちゃんはまだ新宿
overview: Highschooler Akino loves her schoolmate Okada, but Okada has a girlfriend called Nacchan. While Akino is busy being jealous of Nacchan to the point of becoming obsessed with her, she realizes that she is more fascinated by Nacchan than Okada.
title: Please Don't Go Anywhere
